summary.raw: Remove vertical line in tab frame header
summary.html: Remove vertical line in tab frame header

values.message: Remove vertical line in tab frame header

summary.raw: Fixed missed variable rename
summary.html: Fixed missed variable rename

values.message: Fixed missed variable rename

summary.raw:
Removed additional frame around tab - now there is one fewer box around
the content. Removed content margins around the scroll area - all the contents
are themselves widgets with default margins anyway, so no need to double up
with excessive margins.
summary.html:
Removed additional frame around tab - now there is one fewer box around
the content. Removed content margins around the scroll area - all the contents
are themselves widgets with default margins anyway, so no need to double up
with excessive margins.

values.message:
Removed additional frame around tab - now there is one fewer box around
the content. Removed content margins around the scroll area - all the contents
are themselves widgets with default margins anyway, so no need to double up
with excessive margins.

summary.raw:
Put "restart tab" and "clear smart programming" controls to the right of the
top bar of the tab, and make them both toolbuttons. Change the icon of the
"clear smart programming" button. Change in behaviour so that the "clear smart
programming" button is not a toggle, just a button that greys out once you click
it, indicating that that the smart programming cache has been cleared. (even
though the actual clearing does not happen until the next call to
transition_to_buffered)
summary.html:
Put "restart tab" and "clear smart programming" controls to the right of the
top bar of the tab, and make them both toolbuttons. Change the icon of the
"clear smart programming" button. Change in behaviour so that the "clear smart
programming" button is not a toggle, just a button that greys out once you click
it, indicating that that the smart programming cache has been cleared. (even
though the actual clearing does not happen until the next call to
transition_to_buffered)

values.message:
Put "restart tab" and "clear smart programming" controls to the right of the
top bar of the tab, and make them both toolbuttons. Change the icon of the
"clear smart programming" button. Change in behaviour so that the "clear smart
programming" button is not a toggle, just a button that greys out once you click
it, indicating that that the smart programming cache has been cleared. (even
though the actual clearing does not happen until the next call to
transition_to_buffered)

summary.raw:
Moved name of device back to its own row in the tab UI, above the restart
button and refresh smart programming checkbox. But, changed it to be a single
row of text instead of two.
summary.html:
Moved name of device back to its own row in the tab UI, above the restart
button and refresh smart programming checkbox. But, changed it to be a single
row of text instead of two.

values.message:
Moved name of device back to its own row in the tab UI, above the restart
button and refresh smart programming checkbox. But, changed it to be a single
row of text instead of two.

summary.raw:
Removed unnecessary calls to Tab._update_error().

Since _update_error() also updates the tab icon, renamed it to
_update_error_and_tab_icon(), and renamed update_tab_icon_and_colour() to
set_tab_icon_and_colour() to differentiate it, since it is more about
setting the icon and colour rather than figuring out what the icon and colour
should be.
summary.html:
Removed unnecessary calls to Tab._update_error().

Since _update_error() also updates the tab icon, renamed it to
_update_error_and_tab_icon(), and renamed update_tab_icon_and_colour() to
set_tab_icon_and_colour() to differentiate it, since it is more about
setting the icon and colour rather than figuring out what the icon and colour
should be.

values.message:
Removed unnecessary calls to Tab._update_error().

Since _update_error() also updates the tab icon, renamed it to
_update_error_and_tab_icon(), and renamed update_tab_icon_and_colour() to
set_tab_icon_and_colour() to differentiate it, since it is more about
setting the icon and colour rather than figuring out what the icon and colour
should be.

summary.raw:
Ensure that analysis submission code doesn't crash BLACS if it encounters
an invalid server_online status.
summary.html:
Ensure that analysis submission code doesn't crash BLACS if it encounters
an invalid server_online status.

values.message:
Ensure that analysis submission code doesn't crash BLACS if it encounters
an invalid server_online status.

summary.raw:

and be on the left. (the previous attempt at this, backed out in the previous
commit, made additional buttons by mistake).

summary.raw:
Refactor of update_tab_icon_and_colour() to avoid use of exceptions
for control flow, as this was hiding a NameError from an earlier commit.

(also fixed the NameError)
